content: In the code section 3.51, the setName() method will only change the value of name if the new name is not null.  Because setName() is conditionally changing name, it is wise to return a boolean to let the program know if the change was successful.
stemmed: In code section 3.51 , setnam ( ) method chang valu name new name null . becaus setnam ( ) condit chang name , wise return boolean let program know chang success .
